text: This week @user opened applications for Capacity Grants for Rural & Underserved Communities which will help direct resources toward increasing access to home and community-based health care in underserved areas. Learn more here: http

The federal age to purchase a handgun is 21 years old. The federal age to buy an assault rifle is 18. Does that make sense?Raising this age to create federal parity would be a first step toward saving lives.

No one should have to ration a life-sustaining drug because they can‚Äôt afford it. These flaws are exactly why I support legislation to reduce the cost of insulin cap out-of-pocket spending for seniors and allow Medicare to negotiate drug prices. http
